Docs.param: The AdapterView where the click happened.
The view within the AdapterView that was clicked (this will be a view provided by the adapter)
The position of the view in the adapter.
The row id of the item that was clicked.
Docs.summary: Callback method to be invoked when an item in this AdapterView has been clicked.
